titles.title: To establish a procedure for the conveyance of certain Federal property around the Dickinson Reservoir in the State of North Dakota.
To establish a procedure for the conveyance of certain Federal property around the Dickinson Reservoir in the State of North Dakota.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-900.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 696.
